title: Federated learning using smart contracts on blockchains, based on reward driven approach
summaries: leverage the smart contract on a blockchain to define incentivization rules, including rewarding and penalization
the incentivization rules are defined based on the federated contribution, which depicts the deviation, or divergence of two machine learning models.
bibtex: @article{behera2021federated, title={Federated learning using smart contracts on blockchains, based on reward driven approach}, author={Behera, Monik Raj and Upadhyay, Sudhir and Shetty, Suresh}, journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2107.10243}, year={2021}}
